pr_title: Add TODO to replace kubernetes_version with release_channel

timeline.message:
Add TODO to replace kubernetes_version with release_channel

This depends on https://github.com/terraform-google-modules/terraform-google-kubernetes-engine/pull/487 being merged.

timeline.bodyText: Maybe remove this field for now since it doesn't do anything?
timeline.author: umairidris
timeline.diffHunk:
